import './Home.css' import React,{ useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Home() { const dispatch = useDispatch() async function handleLogout() { if (window.confirm("Are you sure logout ")) { await axios.get('/logout') dispatch({ type: "refresh" }) } } const user= useSelector((state)=>state.user) const [open, setOpen]=useState(false) const baseImgUrl="http://localhost:8000/uploads/" console.log(user.details.profile) return (

Profile

setOpen(true)} src={baseImgUrl + user.details.profile} alt="avathar" className="rounded-circle" style={{width: "100px",height:'100px' ,color:"black"}} />
Name
{user.details.name}
Email
{user.details.email}
Ph
{user.details.phone}
); }; export default Home
